template.name: Template Hardware Infotrend EonStore DS
template.description: Do not create for this template discovery rules about luDevStatusSlot because its useless MIB for our hardware, or its just broken.

item.name: Cache Dirty
item.description: MIB: cacheDirty Number of dirty cache blocks Reference: https://www.infortrend.com/ru/download/download

item.name: Cache Total
item.description: MIB: cacheTotal Total number of cache blocks Reference: https://www.infortrend.com/ru/download/download

item.name: Storage Read Req/s
item.description: MIB: curReadRequests Current Read Request Req/S Reference: https://www.infortrend.com/ru/download/download

item.name: Storage Read MB/s
item.description: MIB: curReadStatistic Current Read Statistic MB/S Reference: https://www.infortrend.com/ru/download/download

item.name: Storage Write Req/s
item.description: MIB: curWriteRequests Current Write Request Req/S Reference: https://www.infortrend.com/ru/download/download

item.name: Storage Write MB/s
item.description: MIB: curWriteStatistic Current Write Statistic MB/S Reference: https://www.infortrend.com/ru/download/download

item.name: Firmware engineer version
item.description: MIB: fwEngineerVersion Firmware engineer version Reference: https://www.infortrend.com/ru/download/download

item.name: Firmware major version
item.description: MIB: fwMajorVersion Firmware major version Reference: https://www.infortrend.com/ru/download/download

item.name: Firmware minor version
item.description: MIB: fwMinorVersion Firmware minor version Reference: https://www.infortrend.com/ru/download/download

item.name: Serial Number (Secondary Controller)
item.description: MIB: serialNumSec Serial number of Secodary Controller Reference: https://www.infortrend.com/ru/download/download

item_prototype.name: Associated logical drive ID for HDD in slot number {#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: MIB: hddLdId Logical drive ID to which hard disk drive is belonged 0: If Drive Status == Spare Drive, then drive is Global Spare. Otherwise, indicates drive does not currently belong to any logical drive. 1: If Drive Status == Global Spare Drive, then drive is Enclosure Spare drive. Otherwise, indicates drive does not currently belong to any logical drive. 2: The drive is SSD Cache drive. else: Display the Logical drive ID. Reference: https://www.infortrend.com/ru/download/download

trigger_prototype.name: readTime of the Volumeset {#SNMPINDEX} is higher then 100 ms
readTime of the Volumeset {#SNMPINDEX} is higher then 200 ms
readTime of the Volumeset {#SNMPINDEX} is higher then 500 ms

mapping.newvalue: 6 :Add Drive to Logical Drive in Progress
0x11 :Drive is in process of Cloning another Drive
0x12 :Drive is a valid Clone of another Drive
0x13 :Drive is in process of Copying from another Drive
